Crumpling Blow

The target is knocked prone.

Bludgeoning

Pierced

The target is slowed 1 until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Throat Slash

Normal damage. The target takes 1d8 persistent bleed damage. The target can't talk, cast spells with a verbal component, or breathe while subject to this bleed damage.

Slashing

Life Leech

If this is a spell, the target becomes doomed 1 and you regain 1d8 Hit Points.

Bomb or Spell
